channel.title: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
channel.description:
I'm PRETTY sure this door is meant to be open is it not? I've checked walkthroughs and all sorts. The door for them is just open. The lock cannot be destroyed, I cannot jump over the fence and there is also nothing else in this small area that can help me progress.
Is this a bug or am I missing something?
https://gyazo.com/9828401e7ae1bee69ca70c3959bbd7d8

item.title: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
item.dc:creator: darkone
item.description:
look closely at the pipes there is an opening go for that.

Read full topic
item.source: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman

item.title: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
item.dc:creator: Chryssie
item.description:
Okay, not a problem, that would be fine BUT I tried to do that and there is an invisible wall there. I can’t hop over the fence at all

Read full topic
item.source: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman

item.title: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
The 1.0 beta made it unopenable and forced the player to climb the pipes to the side of it.

I do not know why.

Read full topic
item.source: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman

item.title: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
item.dc:creator: andrewxc
item.description:
Shoot the lock? Not crowbar, that usually doesn’t go through barriers.
Could be that there is an event that you skipped.

Read full topic
item.source: Door LOCKED when it shouldn't be - Forget about Freeman
